evoter.server.http.request.interfaces

Interface IAnswerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnswerService

    public interface IAnswerService
    This is an interface to define methods that works with Answer object in the database
    There is no delete function for answer just because the relation between Question and Answer is UPDATE CASCASDE AND DELETE CASCADE, so when question is deleted, its answers are deleted by default
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BEAN_NAME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object doCreate(long questionId, java.lang.String[] answerTexts) 
      java.lang.Object doDelete(long questionId)
      Delete all answers of a question
      java.lang.Object doEdit(long questionId, java.lang.String[] answerIds, java.lang.String[] answerTexts) 
      java.lang.Object doGetAllAnswer(long questionId)
      Select all Answer of given question
      java.lang.Object doGetStatistics(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameter)
      Get statistics of a given question If there is Answer for that question, returning an empty array
      Otherwise, returning an Answer.toJSON() array
      java.lang.Object doVote(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameter)
      Update the statistic value of Answer
      if question type is slider or input, append a new value to the current statistics value as a string
      if question type is yes/no, agree/disagree, multi-choice, add 1 to the current statistics value

    • Method Detail

      • doCreate

        java.lang.Object doCreate(long questionId,
                        java.lang.String[] answerTexts)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        questionId - question Id value of answer
        answerTexts - an array of answer content
        Returns:
        SUCCESS message if answers are created and inserted to database successfully
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • doEdit

        java.lang.Object doEdit(long questionId,
                      java.lang.String[] answerIds,
                      java.lang.String[] answerTexts)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        answerIds - an array of answer id that needed to be updated content
        answerTexts - an array of answer text
        questionId - question id value of answers to be updated
        Returns:
        SUCCESS message if answers are updated successfully
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • doGetAllAnswer

        java.lang.Object doGetAllAnswer(long questionId)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Select all Answer of given question
        Parameters:
        questionId - question id value of selected Answer
        Returns:
        an Answer.toJSON() array
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • doDelete

        java.lang.Object doDelete(long questionId)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete all answers of a question
        Parameters:
        questionId - question id value of answers will be deleted
        Returns:
        SUCCESS if answers are deleted successfully
        Throws:
        exception - if answers are deleted unsuccessfully
        java.lang.Exception

      • doVote

        java.lang.Object doVote(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameter)
        Update the statistic value of Answer
        if question type is slider or input, append a new value to the current statistics value as a string
        if question type is yes/no, agree/disagree, multi-choice, add 1 to the current statistics value
        Parameters:
        parameter - request parameter contains:
        AnswerDAO.ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        QuestionDAO.QUESTION_TYPE_ID
        AnswerDAO.STATISTICS if the question type is slider or input
        Returns:
        SUCCESS message if updating the number of vote for Answer successfully

      • doGetStatistics

        java.lang.Object doGetStatistics(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameter)
        Get statistics of a given question If there is Answer for that question, returning an empty array
        Otherwise, returning an Answer.toJSON() array
        Parameters:
        parameter - contains
        UserDAO.USER_KEY for account verification
        QuestionDAO.ID question id of answers that have statistics value
        Returns:
        json array contains answer ID and its statistics if question has statistics
